website_summaries.verdict: A great value for a triangular shade sail that includes nylon chords.
pros: Size options ranging from 8 feet to a massive 24 feet makes for a good cover for any patio
The fabric is 100% polyethylene and offers 90% harmful UV protection
cons: The polyethylene fabric is not very durable, with some shade sails lasting as short as six months in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Work great on our playground area.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Love them. Good shade. Durable. Strong. Works great on playground where you need shade. Hung mine with small stainless steel (aircraft) cable and you can barely see the support wires. They just hang in the air providing good shade above the playground. Good product and price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The 1 piece of nylon rope this came with was worthlessly weak - fortunately the d-rings at each corner are strong enough and I had some braided nylon handy/leftover. Gives good shade and goes up easily - now to see how long it lasts. Update: My 16' brown shade is now 18 months old. It has 1-2 dime sized tears from a large pecan tree dropping branches. Otherwise it is still as good as day one. I've done nothing to treat the tears and they have not spread. Holding up fine to Texas 100*F+ sun daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Nice in theory
customer_reviews.text: Nice in theory, but don't last more than 6 months over our pool and then have to be replaced. The 2nd year I bought them, they came with 3 year warranty but the company does not answer email to get them replaced when they started to fall apart after just 1 summer up. Have one in a shaded area over a pond that is doing OK, but as a shade getting direct light, terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Shade sail doubles as a cat hammock
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shade sail to give us some shade over our back deck that is exposed to full sun. It has helped cut down the glare of the sun and seems to be doing a good job. We just purchased a second sail to give additional coverage. The sails were easy to install and have given good protection from the Texas sun. My cat Charlie thinks we bought these as a hammock just for him.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it last fall, to put up as a shade for our pool equipment in the spring. As such, we didn't open the package until a few weeks ago, outside of the return window. There was a large snag, and several holes in the material, down the middle of the shade. We sent an email to the seller and Amazon. It's been several weeks now, with nothing heard from either the seller or Amazon. We are greatly disappointed, as the size, color, and material were exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: sherman t.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach too!
customer_reviews.text: Love my shades. They are the coolest thing on the beach. Got a red and an orange one
customer_reviews.author: Benoit Denault

customer_reviews.title: Both were easy to install in my small backyard after I installed ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, one red, one beige. The beige color was just what I wanted but the red was underrepresented as to how orange-red it is. Both were easy to install in my small backyard after I installed a few D ring anchors using sleeve masonry anchors in brick mortar and deck screws for the garage siding. I ditched the included rope and got some paracord; learn to tie some trucker hitches and these things go up very taught like the pictures. They keep my patio significantly more comfortable than without on hot sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, can't handle the wind
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this sail over my patio, however I have purchased this product three times in the past 3 years because it cannot stand up to the winds we have here in Texas. Although it says it has a 3 year warranty, I have found that the warranty does not cover the issues I am having, like splitting and fraying. As long as you don't mind buying a new one each year, this sail is a nice shady feature for your yard. It DOES get a bit bleached by the sun, but for the most part it maintains the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: TxSoccerChic

customer_reviews.title: GOOD & BAD
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does the job in the HOT Florida sun - for the first time in years we're swimming in middle of the day. Fabricated to last; however, the connecting metal rings are NOT stainless steel are rusting after only 10 weeks. Will be replacing them with non-rusting carabiners. Took a couple of tries to find "best" location due to changing angle of the sun - guess I should have paid better attention in HS Geometry class. For installation, we used stainless steel "hoops" and also stainless snaps. Using the snaps, we were able to take it down in about 5 minutes in prep for predicted storm.
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: Love them! They stretch tight and look great
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They stretch tight and look great! Make sure you mark your posts in the correct spot to save a huge headache!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Norman

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price point
customer_reviews.text: A good product for the price point. I installed 5 over our pool and patio area over a year ago. We love the shade and sun protection in here in hot Texas. I had to replace one already because it had become brittle and started tearing from sun and elements exposure. The other four seem to still be good other than the chrome rings are rusting from not being properly coated. They are an economical product, but they should last at least five years. One last note, we installed blue and beige, both have held their color well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I like the shade sail
customer_reviews.text: I like the shade sail. Unfortunately, the shape didn't work very well for our patio and we went for a rectangular and larger one. The material is good and has been on for a few weeks now, we had strong winds and hale, and the shade had no damage. The only suggestion I have is that If you are considering the triangle, keep in mind that the are actually covered is the inside of the triangle, so you probably need a shade that is considerably larger than the area you want covered.
customer_reviews.author: Karibuh

customer_reviews.title: A Pain AND CANNOT CONTACT.....LOOK OUT
customer_reviews.text: Sails are fine, but the pad eyes are rusting after one season. NO WEB SITE AVAILABLE. BEWARE I will update IF they respond.
customer_reviews.author: toomuchtohear

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. But is not made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Item does the job. I installed using my own system and holds up nice and strong. I have it set to about 60 pounds of pressure on all 3 sides holds true and strong. Took a star off for not being made in USA. This item was made in China!!! Update: the metal rings are now rusted almost completely through. I have to no replace the rings to prevent any damage from happening before a strong wind storm comes in and destroy the tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but may fall apart if UV damage occurs.
customer_reviews.text: These are good sunscreens, and provided a lot of shade for Arizona. It does get hot and very sunny here,and two of the three I ordered have held up well. The ropes are garbage however. One of them did not hold up to UV damage, and it's basically falling apart after two years. However, the other two are still going strong. After some exposure to rain and falling intothe pool, some of the metal hardware is rusting slightly, but it's holding up fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to wait out the summer. We live ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait out the summer. We live on a hill and get a lot of wind. We also got a ton of rain this summer. This sail took it all with zero damage. It protects a sitting area under a large oak tree. Lots of bird droppings. Garden hose washed most of it off and when we took it down Dawn and a soft brush got is clean as new. One suggestion. The sail will sag, especially after a rain. I hooked one corner to the oak tree and then set two 4X4 poles for the other two corners. They are about 8 1/2 feet off the ground and I wish they were about 2 feet higher.
customer_reviews.author: david fazio

customer_reviews.title: Great color, doesn't cover much space, cheap screws
customer_reviews.text: So the color is fabulous, the size isn't as big as I thought it would be. The hardware it came for attaching it is quality, unfortunately the screws are the cheapest thing I've ever seen. The tops of the screws shred as you drill them into place with the electric drill. I mean how cheap are screws, to give you proper ones?! That's what took this down a notch in my book. I'm having to order a second one, because it didn't cover as much space as the one I got from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is too long, hardware rusting
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived NOT made in USA despite what product profile says. Blue material quality is good; thick, not flimsy. I take sail down if there is a “storm a brewin’” so it is never abused other than by the sun. The 3 D rings at each vertex are showing evidence of rust. I wonder if I should contact the seller for an exchange, after all, it has a "3 year warranty". The shipping was a fiasco; it was delayed far too long. Delivery from Windscreen4less is atrociously long. So unfortunately, I’ll deal with it. Summary = Material quality is good; Hardware is fair; Shipping time is horrendous; Product description validity is misrepresented; Stated warranty is good but I didn't use
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to install but great shade
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I a few hours to get this up. Instructions weren't great but once up its has been wonderful.our back deck is so much more enjoyable now. We have 2 sides attached to the house and the third to a large tree in our backyard with green 550cord that becomes invisible in the trees. It's great and we get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, helps create great shade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a fourth of July camping trip where I knew shade would be at a premium. The canopy performed very well and is made with quality materials. During our week of camping, a thunderstorm with 60 mph winds came out of nowhere (I literally had zero warning or time to take this down), and it held up without any damage. I would highly recommend. I can't speak for long term/everyday use, as I only use this sporadically, but am very impressed thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beilharz

customer_reviews.title: 2 triangles failed within 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and was happy with them for a while. Within two years however, both of the Triangles I purchased deteriorated due to sun damage and came apart. First with small holes then crumbling entirely. There is supposed to be a three year warranty but I honestly don’t see how they can offer that with these. This is in direct contrast to some other triangles I purchased a few years earlier that are still in use and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Much Brighter Blue than the photo
customer_reviews.text: We chose this brand over the other brands because the photo showed it to be a paler blue than the others. What we received was a bright shiny blue that looks pretty much like a blue tarp from Home Depot. Disappointing! It appears to be made as well as other shade sails we have purchased on Amazon and from Costco. However, in less than 1 month and after 2 monsoon rains, one of the metal D-rings is already showing signs of rust. I see no compelling reason to buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: PST MD

customer_reviews.title: Great product however the color is off a little
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice . I ordered a different brand last time. These one have a reinforced strap that you put the nylon rope through. This is super important if you have wind. The color said tan however they are more yellow then tan. I would of returned them because I needed true TAN COLOR but i was desperate for shade. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, full size stated and comes with white six ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, full size stated and comes with white six feet nylon rope. I replaced it with my own smaller rope.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: That was a nice surprise and it proved really useful since it allowed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product and it met my expectations. This was the second time I ordered one of these triangles and this time it came with a long piece of rope. That was a nice surprise and it proved really useful since it allowed me to position the shade perfectly. Remember that the shade does not come with any hardware. One needs to order that separately.
customer_reviews.author: P Corsius

customer_reviews.title: Stretches!  And now sags in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: The shade stretched quite a bit, after installation (and a few rain showers). This is obviously problematic, as I've already installed the mounting brackets, and now the shade is sagging in the middle. I even went so far as to tighten the 2 turnbuckles all the way, and then ultimately removed them and replaced them with small carbineers. It still sags. I wish this had been made clearer in the instructions, so I could've installed the mounting brackets farther apart.
customer_reviews.author: J. Earl

customer_reviews.title: One beige and another one red just like this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these last year and this year. One beige and another one red just like this one. The beige still going on strong this one is starting to rip. I hope it was just a bad batch. It says 5 year warranty when I bought it now it says 3. I hope there are no issues replacing this product. Update. Changed from1 star to 3 stars since they were quick to replace the item. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gios

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, plan on posts at least 17' apart
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed this, I placed steel posts 16'-8" apart inside to inside, I'd recommend at least 17' apart. Sail looks great but strearched more than I expected when tighten it, so I have a slight dip, not as taught as I hopped it would be. But still looks and works great. I'll try to post picture.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This keeps my porch significantly cooler
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought 3 of these for my porch, and they have been up for a few months now. They have stretched out a little bit, which was expected because of the material that they are made of, but there are no thin spots, holes or tears in them. The quality is great, and I am impressed with them. They help to keep the porch much cooler than just being in direct sunlight, and if I had to buy these again, I would in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Used and wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived used, with no rope and some dirt. It is also not the size it's supposed to be. I am returning it. I ordered two exactly the same last week and they were fine. I will reorder and hope I get another good one.
customer_reviews.author: stop

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a blue tarp
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to hang and looks nice. I wish I hadn't chosen the blue because it looks like I have a FEMA tarp over my patio. I thought it would look a little more sky blue. But for less than $30 I'll live with the color and choose tan like all my neighbors next time. If the blue was less tarp looking, I would've given it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Anything to keep my boys comfortable. They block sun quite well and don't come ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to give my big dogs an expanded shady area in the afternoon. Anything to keep my boys comfortable. They block sun quite well and don't come apart on windy days, they just rise and fall with the wind. I'm glad that I bought them and they were simple to install by attaching two ends with metal hooks to my rear deck and the third end is tied to a chain link fence with supplied nylon rope.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, provides decent shade.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, provides decent shade. The sail is basically a tarp without the plastic coating. It's light weight and allows water to pass through so nothing really sags it. The sail also comes with rope but it's best to purchase some cable and heavy hooks because it will move in the wind. That said, the triangular shape doesn't pull in the wind nearly as much as a 4-sided shade would, but it also doesn't provide as much shade. We liked it enough to buy a second one for additional shade around the patio.
customer_reviews.author: jason dobe

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shade.
customer_reviews.text: The nylon rope that comes with the unit is pretty cheap. The 12x12x12 is a bit smaller than I thought it would be. I have this hanging above my patio, time will tell how durable it is. I bought the recommended hardware kit which was pretty straight forward to install.
customer_reviews.author: TyrannosaurusDunx

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet sophistocated quality design
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely wonderful! We purchased these 2 of these for our wedding to shade the dance floor. We used them to cover a rug-covered portion of a paved-gravel driveway. They were stunning. Easily attached to the rental tent and easily posted with tall dry bamboo stalks into the ground. They were still up the next day, and lasted the night before (where a land-tsunami hit!) These will now now go out on the back deck for shading. Great quality, and very sophisticated looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Fabric holds up, but the metal rings rust
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for 5 years now, and probably have had it up in the air a total of 10-12 months. I only have it up in summer and I take it down for storms. The fabric has held up really well, but the metal rings are very rusty. I wish they were made of something that doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great...but works well.
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected. I own several of these from various brands, and typically the material is the same. I'd have rated higher except that the sail is bunched up rather than laying flat. I'm not overly picky, just stating a fact. I have one from another brand set up next to this the same way, and it lies perfectly flat. They are all attached with bungee cords and have similar tension. So it works, and looks good overall, other than not having flat seams. It's good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: ST1

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fabric!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in the material. We have an Airstream and I was expecting something like the material their awnings are made from. This is a scratch, thin fabric that gives minimal shade. I don’t expect it to last more than one season at best. Too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.  The product is working well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was a bit different than I expected but once it is hung up it looks nice. I have a very small patio area but ended up buying this 16x16x16 shade instead of the 12x12x12. Be sure to measure and purchase the correct size. I purchased the hardware separately since it's not included and it's worked out well. But I do wish they included a little more rope with the sun shade. I had to purchase additional rope to make the shade work. Overall, I'm pleased with this product and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the $
customer_reviews.text: This is as described. I plan on buying a couple more. Pretty thick and appears it will last a few summers or more (only had it 2 months now). For the $ you can't beat it! The size is smaller than you think. I got the 16x16x16 and it "looks" more like a 12x12x12 (it is actually 16 but just looks smaller than you think once installed).
customer_reviews.author: matt M

customer_reviews.title: Material was different than expected but seems to work well and installation was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Different material than I thought it would be(I thought it was going to be a cloth) but its more like a woven tarp, seems like decent quality though and the installation was easy, though there isn't an installation guide contained in the package so you'll want to watch some youtube videos. Only took a couple of hours start to finish though(I didn't need to install any posts for my application)
customer_reviews.author: foff667

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea and look but this particular material is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea and look but this particular material is very low quality... Windscreen4less would NOT answer to my emails trying to see what they would be willing to do after both sun sails (a rectangular and triangular one) fell apart less than 6 months after installation. While I did not expect a super durable product for the price, I expected to get at least a year of use on these... Nonetheless, I did not appreciate Windscreen4less ignoring my emails...
customer_reviews.author: Mid

customer_reviews.title: love it, be mindful of the CURVED sides.
customer_reviews.text: awesome, I wish I would have bought a bigger size! I put this above my pool. I have a 15ft round pool. I thought this would be enough to cover most of it. I was wrong. even though it says 16x16x16 I overlooked the curved sides of the triangle. its more narrow. it still covers over half of the pool so I'm very happy about it. now we can go swimming in the hot 100+ degrees of Houston TX!! highly recommend this if you have kids. material felt more like a rough tarp. plastic weaved.
customer_reviews.author: Aperture1

customer_reviews.title: Wow Shade Sails are amazing
customer_reviews.text: It requires some planning and experimentation to mount properly on poles. My poles were about 10 feet high, but I had to mount them off of the deck so they needed to be higher. The shade is incredible without the hassle and problems of an umbrella. GET THIS !
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pisces

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, red and tan... they are up in my back yard and i LOVE them. They add a great tropical feel for my fire pit and keep the annoying leaves out of the sand... i live in Florida and the wind has been crazy, but it has had no effect on them (knock on wood).
customer_reviews.author: DEA2040

customer_reviews.title: Finally replacing the tree we cut down.
customer_reviews.text: We cut our shade tree down two seasons ago and just could not take the heat bearing down on our pool deck area. A solid shade sail. Seems to be well built to provide a few years of service. At the $30 price point per sail, it is rather inexpensive to replace every year. I hope to get 3 + seasons from them before replacing. Installation is tricky if you don't have the perfect scenario. As you can see in the pictures, I had to get creative in order for it to look decent and somewhat professional. Read all of our other product reviews at CritDicks.com - Industry Insider Reviews - Products\Places\Services
customer_reviews.author: CritDicks

customer_reviews.title: The best buy by far
customer_reviews.text: We have had several of these sun sails over the years. We hang 3 over the pond to keep it shaded and limit algae growth. Every several years we have had to replace one that has been damaged by strong winds but at this price, no worries. They look beautiful and are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: KariH

customer_reviews.title: Exellent product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 of these to help shade my pool in Mexico. They arrived in great condition and just as advertised. Found out I only need 2 but they have been up for several weeks now and are doing a great job. They even survived a heavy duty rain and wind storm without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harner

customer_reviews.title: We liked it so much we purchased a second to stagger ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. The first we bought last year and after an entire summer it still hasn’t faded and is back up shading our patio. We liked it so much we purchased a second to stagger and got rid of our bent table umbrella! It is not waterproof so rain can still come through but it does keep drizzle out. Easy to tie up with the attached rope and we added some bungee cords as needed for length. The color is really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Plute-Schlitter

customer_reviews.title: There were many hanging strings on the seems that needed to be clipped off for it to look nice. There was not enough rope to tie
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shade sale for use over our sons play area. It only took us about 20 mins to put it up, including the time climbing up the ladder into the trees. It provides shade and protests his yard from some of the falling leaves. Things that could be improved upon, There were many hanging strings on the seems that needed to be clipped off for it to look nice. There was not enough rope to tie all three sides. Warning: The texture is extremely rough (so wear long sleeves or it will scratch up your arms if you have delicate skin. However, for providing shade it does it's job well. (picture included don't mind all the construction mess)
customer_reviews.author: Mamaa4444

customer_reviews.title: love this, I lost a palm tree to lighting ...
customer_reviews.text: love this , I lost a palm tree to lighting strike last year, my entire patio is now in constant sun. I used the trunk of the palm tree and anchored to my home . I have had it up for a year now and the sail looks brand new, has survived rainey season, multiple wind and tropical storms,. Gives enough shade to keep the patio cooler for my dogs. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: nightnurse65

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They seem really durable and well made. They went up quickly, and that was perfect for the heat wave we are in right now. I'll update how they hold up as time passes. Right now I am glad to have them, and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We have had these sun shades for about a month and they are holding up well. Keep in mind that the triangles curve in on the edges so there is not quite as much surface area as the dimensions suggest. I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good when installed. I was expecting it to be larger considering I ordered 20'x20'x20' sail, but it was considerably shorter than my 20 ' wide patio. It held up to moderate rain and wind quite well. Not sure how durable it will be long term.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, good strength and grommets are well sewn into the fabric. Easy to work with. Takes a little creativity to put up but shades well. I gave it a 4 star only because the color beige we ordered is pretty muted.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Shade for my doggie area
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have a dog area on the side of the house, and in AZ it can get quite hot here, so I needed some type of shade for them. I have seen these shades at clients houses and decided to try the triangle one. It fit perfect. I had to do some adjustments to get it where I needed it to go. Tip. I purchased Paracord because the ropes that come with it got frail quite quickly and not able to hold it up as it did in the beginning, otherwise it's perfect for my pack.
customer_reviews.author: AZHikingGal

customer_reviews.title: Good sun shades for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as my last "tan" shades, 16x16x16. I got 3 years out of the last ones, they literally fell apart from the sun exposure. There were a few snags in 2 of them, hope it doesn't effect the lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey King

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These are not my first sunshades from windsreen4less. I have had a blue one for years. I am not done with the pool deck but the shades are up and look great. It’s suppose to be 100 this weeks so just in time.
customer_reviews.author: G Moneyless

customer_reviews.title: Great shade!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our back yard! The sail arrived quickly, in perfect shape. Provides the perfect amount of shade over our pool, we're in Arizona, so we need all the shade we can get! It's held up perfectly through several severe storms with no stretching or tearing. The color hasn't faded at all either in the sun. Love it so much we're ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You could not make one for this price..
customer_reviews.text: ..even if you had similar materials and the machines. (I do) I am not a fan of the cloth - just mount it higher. BUT, the price delivered with Prime is less than 2-3 yards of a fancier fabric. It is well made for use at home. Jim
customer_reviews.author: JimCan

customer_reviews.title: I love them and bought 3 of them
customer_reviews.text: I love them and bought 3 of them , easy to put up not that heavy and not that light . we have them set up over our pool and they look great and provide us with shade. These are really awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Anja Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: Corners not made as photographed - no strap, just textile itself folded over and stitched flat, very cheezy. Also, un-reinforced perimeter. Sent back. "3rd generation" means all the quality squeezed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Looking Good!!
customer_reviews.text: These shade sails have been up about a year and still look great! You'll need to get good turn buckets to keep them tight and secure. I'd highly recommend these, specially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: L Maccagno

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: We will have 5 installed once we get this latest one up. They create shade where two giant red oaks used to be. an added benefit may be that (knock on wood) they keep the Great Blue Herons at bay from our fish pond!
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sunscreen. Its a little hard at finding anchor points to match corners it it's held up fine for the first summer. Took it down for winter. It does trap leafs
customer_reviews.author: Heath Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3+ years
customer_reviews.text: Under strong winds it lasted quite well for over three years. Now after three years and 3 months I am going to order a new one, hoping it will last at least that much.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Sivan

customer_reviews.title: Provides shade for the kennel
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, did not have ropes attached, but they were in the package. Seems as well made as the Coolaroo sunshade I bought last year. I bought this to cover a dog kennel, so just used carabiners to clip on to the fencing. It stretched a little the first day, making an adjustment necessary, but has not stretched more since. Stands up to high winds and provides the shade where the dog needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Woofie

customer_reviews.title: awesome windscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this wind screen. It's easy to install durable and it looks so pretty. It's bigger than I thought it was going to be but it provides wonderful shade on my patio. Be sure to buy the installation kit as it only comes with rope. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because it was a little wrinkled when it was packaged and the wrinkles haven't come out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: provides good shade
customer_reviews.text: gave this to my dad as a gift so he could put it over his pool and he says it works great. it gives enough shade over one part of his pool so he can stay cool while he is out there with the grandkids. He said it was really easy to put up as well. I may get him another to give a little more shade in the hot florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t collect water!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried many shade sail from different seller now, and all the fabric are too dense that it would collect water during rain. I had few got tear apart because I forgot to remove them. Finally got this one that can let the water pass through, yet filter all the strong sun light. The texture fits well with my pergola.
customer_reviews.author: Ava C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Keep in mind though...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Most likely plan on buying more rope and hanging kit. I believe this happens from every vendor: In order to choose the right size keep in mind that sides are curved so don't expect this shade to cover the same area as a 16x16x16 triangle.
customer_reviews.author: José N.

customer_reviews.title: NOT RED!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because it stated RED as the color; NOT...it is a Tera cotta clay orange!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of shade
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I bought another one. We put them both over our patio, it has cooled down not only our patio, but the rooms on that side of the house. We have only had it for the last couple months, hopefully it’ll last a few years. If it doesn’t I won’t hesitate to buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase from this sell and for my third property that I have put up these sails on. The tenants love them and they are so well built, made to last.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Pool Shade
customer_reviews.text: The hardware kit arrived separately and after the canopy, not a big deal. I used the brackets and needed additional rope length for our installation so I used other rope. Looks good and is helping with mid afternoon sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We were really excited to hang this in our backyard ...
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to hang this in our backyard because it is really well made and we were looking forward to having some shade. Unfortunately, the isosceles shape of it is very hard to hang and we had to return for a right triangle shaped sail which is way easier to hang in corners.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Graber

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This will be the second windscreen that I have purchased. Will most likely purchase two more in the coming months. They are very durable and have survived the high wind storms that New Mexico often has during the year. The windscreen also provides excellent shade for our hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R Ittner

customer_reviews.title: Has more orange hue than expected...
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get this sail for our patio, could not wait to unpack it and attach it, but were soon enough disappointed with the color. The sail is well made, sturdy, with breathable material, but it is not really beige as described. It has a lot of orange in it and it fights with our house color... :O( If you really do not mind specific color, than get it!
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Best Shade Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I've ever gotten! Our backyard is oddly shaped and with a kidney pool, we couldn't fit a standard square gazebo. This provides shade and has withstood high Oklahoma winds and heat. I recommend wire cable and trying to connect a few shades to one metal clip connector (to minimize lots of ropes or wires). They are so awesome at providing shade! Get a few and you will not be sorry.. all of our friends are getting them now too!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The D rings aren't stainless so they're rusting after a few months. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelam

customer_reviews.title: Looks good won't last.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these that jas never dry rotted. I uace had my first one since 2011 still in obe piece. We take store them in the winter. This one only lasted 3 seasons very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary haw

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended! Warranty Honored by Windscreen4less! AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Sunscreen in 2016. In 2018, I noticed that it was torn with a small hole. I contacted Windscreen4less and they immediately sent me a replacement Sunscreen at no cost. Thank you Windscreen4less for honoring your warranty! I highly recommend this product. AAAAAAAA+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Drumworx

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Warning! This product is not as advertised. I ordered two of the 16'x'16'x16' shade sails and both measured 14' 6" - a full foot and a half short on all sides - and that is measuring along the curve of the seam with a tape measure. I've ordered 16' shade triangles from other sellers on Amazon and they measured a full 16 feet grommet to grommet and there is a noticeable difference in the total area covered. It was quality fabric with strong stitching but that is the only good thing I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Jivey66

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty much all the same so I try and find ...
customer_reviews.text: I replace these every few years after they get faded and sun rot so I recently purchased this one. They are pretty much all the same so I try and find the cheapest one. It's okay however one side seems to be cut and sewn longer than the other two sides so it has a slight sag compared to the other sides after I tighten everything up. I'll have to see if I can adjust it better.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick. This was a little bigger than I anticipated, but after installation I noticed a small tear in the middle. It was about the size of a quarter, but I didn’t mind. It’s only been up for 4-5 days and it’s only rained once, but the metal clips on the corners are already rusted. The rust bled over the windscreen material on the corners as well. If it wasn’t such a pain to install, I would probably ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sail shade to cover my hot tub and provide a little privacy. It does all that and adds a pop of color to the back yard. The sides and attach points are sturdy. So far it's taking the Texas sun well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Leone

customer_reviews.title: Sun, shade, sail, not easy to say but easy on the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to create a little shade and cut down on algae growth, I purchased this to go above my pond. The color is nice and blends well with nature. It's fairly non-obtrusive if placed well. It's light weight and has been durable thus far. My only complaint is that the metal rings rusted within 3 days of putting this up. It's still functional, but the rust is a little frustrating. That said, the fish haven't complained and it did cut down a little on the direct sunlight to the pond.
customer_reviews.author: dogmomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is much much lighter weight than any sail shade I've purchased. I can understand why some reviewers stated these sail shades ripped, very lightweight throughout including hardware. Everything about this sail shade can be described as petite...
customer_reviews.author: theunartistTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Just finally got around to put this up and there ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finally got around to put this up and there are 2 holes in it. The time frame to return items is over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a blue construction tarp
customer_reviews.text: Although there wasn't anything wrong with the product, it didn't quite fit the area. I loved the color but our neighbors thought we had storm damage because it looked like a blue plastic construction tarp. We ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: problem with stretching shade properly
customer_reviews.text: Shade sail seems good quality only time will tell, but I am not able to get the big belly to pull out of the middle. I have strong support poles, and turn buckles but still it will not hang as nice as I would like. Otherwise, I have no other complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: safaririder

customer_reviews.title: Replaced with this because of price.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Arrived in timely manner. Up for 10 days. So far so good. Have had a few windy days. Doing okay.
customer_reviews.author: billywoo

customer_reviews.title: Functional sunshade!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very functional, but it requires being screwed into things which luckily we had 2 trees and a fence post in the perfect spots for all 3 sides. Great quality material, though!
customer_reviews.author: Dana D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic windscreen!
customer_reviews.text: We love this wind and sun screen!! Purchasing a second one now. It helps so much w keeping some shade. Is as described. Doesn't hold out rain, but it said it wouldn't. Looks great, does the job, and is a great price at under $30!
customer_reviews.author: Regg

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED NOT MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.text: Only bought this product, because it stated on all of the photos made in the USA. I received this product only to open the package and see a label that says (MADE IN CHINA TO USA). I would hope that Amazon would have some type of guide lines to this false advertising. Needless to say its on its way back and not only that, its more like a cheap blue tarp, looks like its made out of the same material.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Super Shade !
customer_reviews.text: These are great products. We have ordered 4 of them and they are great for shading our plants and skylights .
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Crappy material, but worth price
customer_reviews.text: Great for price but sacrificed aesthetics. Looks like your basic tarp material. Was for my dogs. If it was over my patio or near the house it would be way too cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: A sunshade that if you put in the sun disintegrate in less than six months
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very happy I spent a lot of money making metal poles and I purchased 18 of these in different colors. They look great for about three months then they started falling apart and now less than a year later of taking them all down actually been down for four months most of them because they fell apart I thought it read that there had three-year warranty is very disappointed .The picture shows what’s left of one of them the entire middle section is gone all that’s left is the outside bands in the wire attached.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Michaels

customer_reviews.title: A good solution that looks nice, too
customer_reviews.text: Comes exactly as described. The hardware is good quality metal and easy to mount on wood surfaces. (if you need to mount the hardware on a brick or stone surface, you will have to buy different screws). The rope is nice and thick with lots of length. The sail itself is well constructed and shields from the sun extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a sunny garden
customer_reviews.text: We have had 3 of these in the last 7 years. They have provided cover for a poolside table in midday then some afternoon shade for a garden
customer_reviews.author: Buck

product_meta.title: Windscreen4less 16' x 16' x 16' Sun Shade Sail Canopy in Beige with Commercial Grade (3 Year Warranty) Customized Sizes Available
feature_bullets: 16' x 16' x 16' (4.9m x 4.9m x 4.9m) triangle shaped sunshade sails block up to 95% of harmful UV rays. Can be used over a patio, driveway or other outdoor areas to block harmful sun lights
Curved sides add 1"-8" for each side of sail, and enhances pull strength & prevent drooping
Constructed with brand new 180GSM high density polyethylene knitted fabric with strong stitched seam, breathable and allows cooling breeze to pass through to prevent water pooling
D-ring design on each corner, with 16 feet PE rope makes it easy for hanging
Has a 3-year warranty, and it’s easy to clean with mild detergent and water. It is fade resistant, and is free of mild, mildew and stains

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,062 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
